name: Wrapped Millix
description: Wrapped Millix (WMLX) is an ERC-20 token. One Wrapped Millix (WMLX) is equivalent to 1,000,000 Millix (MLX). A wrapped token is a type of cryptocurrency that represents the value of another cryptocurrency. It allows users to hold, trade, and transfer the value of a cryptocurrency that may not be natively supported by the platform they are using. Wrapped Millix (WMLX) allows integration of Millix into the Ethereum ecosystem. WMLX can be ‘unwrapped’ to redeem MLX on the millix network.
